entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain or snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain or snow changing to snow and ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
